title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, there is excessive flashing observed. The flashing occurs in all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
OB: While running the control example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, reducing the excessive flashing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the control example. 
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 
3. Observe the excessive flashing in all tabs of the TabFolder and all Frames.
